alloy: Neutral, balanced, and versatile. Suited for explainers, tutorials, and general content.
ash: Warm and approachable with a modern tone. Good for customer-facing or friendly product narration.
ballad: Smooth and storytelling-oriented. Ideal for narrative or documentary-style videos.
cedar: Rich and authoritative. Recommended for professional or high-quality narration.
coral: Bright and engaging. Works well for upbeat marketing or lifestyle content.
echo: Clear and direct. Fits instructional or technical narration.
fable: Expressive and characterful. Great for creative or branded storytelling.
marin: Polished and professional. Recommended for premium or high-quality narration.
nova: Friendly and conversational. Good for casual explainers and product demos.
onyx: Deep and confident. Best for serious, corporate, or documentary tone.
sage: Calm and trustworthy. Suited for educational or wellness content.
shimmer: Warm and inviting. Ideal for lifestyle or aspirational content.
verse: Articulate and refined. Fits editorial or narrative-style videos.
